title: People playing Qiyana in Ranked!
body:
Just had a player that wanted to pick Qiyana in ranked so I had to dodge... she's new. how you gonna play her in ranked already?

This is so annoying and costs me LP. Now in upcoming matches i'll have to waste my ban to her.

replies.body: This happens with every champion. It's not news.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ivkhkZhX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-06-29T06:58:19.979+0000)
>
> This happens with every champion. It's not news.

Yes, but normally there's a practice tool. Currently, there is none.

> [{quoted}](name=Beerstein,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ivkhkZhX,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2019-06-29T07:00:37.880+0000)
>
> Yes, but normally there's a practice tool. Currently, there is none.

There are other games modes besides ranked and the Practice Tool.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ivkhkZhX,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2019-06-29T07:05:06.599+0000)
>
> There are other games modes besides ranked and the Practice Tool.

No there aren't. You're thinking of "normal" where they mix diamonds with lvl 10s.

> [{quoted}](name=Beerstein,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ivkhkZhX,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2019-06-29T07:06:58.610+0000)
>
> No there aren't. You're thinking of "normal" where they mix diamonds with lvl 10s.

And what kind of teammates and opponents do you get in Practice Tool?

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ivkhkZhX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-06-29T06:58:19.979+0000)
>
> This happens with every champion. It's not news.

so because someone else trollpicks I have to lose lp lmao
I played her 4 times in ranked already, pretty happy to first time and still do better than 3 of my teammates. Bruisers in midlane <3

> [{quoted}](name=CrazyMonkeyCZ,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ivkhkZhX,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-06-29T06:59:25.893+0000)
>
> I played her 4 times in ranked already, pretty happy to first time and still do better than 3 of my teammates. Bruisers in midlane <3

match history or it didnt happen

> [{quoted}](name=Linda de Mol,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ivkhkZhX,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-06-29T07:02:36.501+0000)
>
> match history or it didnt happen

It didn't.

Then maybe stop banning her in normals?

I've tried to play her a bunch, and trust me, the number of games where she was banned and me and my friends dodged because of it higher than the number of games I got to play her.
BuT i PlAyeD hEr In PbE
